ygData.subject: RE: Vox Dead on Tarew Marr
ygData.msgSnippet: yes that is going too far.  to clarify, our usual dragon loot rules are not exactly anyone who can use the item, but anyone that WILL use the item on the
ygData.messageBody:
yes that is going too far. to clarify, our usual dragon loot rules are not
exactly anyone who can use the item, but anyone that WILL use the item on
the character that came on the raid. not a single caster there would wear
that belt, period. therefore they would not be in the lotto.

Shada

>
> THEN came the belt and I forgot who the casters name was but
> he yelled since
> it was an all all that EVERYONE randoms for it.. now THAT is
> crossing the
> line.. I would LOVE LOVE LOVED to have that belt..i WOULD use
> it and I WANT
> a haste sash as I do not have one yet..
>
> I do agree bard are very deserving of a roll in the belt.. a
> caster on the
> other hand....... I dont think should
>
> Tuldar 40th bard
> Tarew Marr
